title: sa_maitreyavyākaraṇa
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
  <div>
<note>1. Gilgit Manuscript

Majumder, Prabhas Chandra (1959), Ārya Maitreya-vyākaraṇam, Calcutta (also published in Nalinaksha Dutt, Gilgit Manuscripts, vol. IV, Calcutta 1959, pp. xxix ff. and 185 ff., under P.C. Mazumder).

The first folios of the Skt. text containing verses 1-30 are missing.
All the sandhis are standardized.</note>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>(daśa māsāṃś ca) nikhilān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhārayitvā mahādyutim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>supuṣpite 'smin udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maitreyajananī tataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na niṣaṇṇā nipannā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitā sā dharmacāriṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drumasya śākhām ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maitreyaṃ janayiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alipto garbhapaṅkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuśeśayam ivāmbunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>traidhātukam idaṃ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhayā pūrayiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prīto 'tha taṃ sahasrākṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devarājā śacīpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāyamānaṃ grahītā sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maitreyaṃ dvipadottamam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padāni jātamātraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptāsau prakramiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pade pade nidhanaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmaṃ padmaṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>diśaś catasraś codvīkṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācaṃ pravyāhariṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ me paścimā jātir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsti bhūyaḥ punarbhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>na punar abhyāgamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>nirvāsyāmi nirāsravaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃsārārṇavamagnānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sattvānāṃ duḥkhabhāginām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛṣṇābandhanabaddhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kariṣyāmi vimocanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvetaṃ cāsya surāś chattraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhārayiṣyanti mūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śītoṣṇavāridhārābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgendrau snāpayiṣyataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratigṛhya ca taṃ dhātrī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvātriṃśadvaralakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śriyā jvalantaṃ maitreyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātre samupaneṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoramāṃ ca śivikāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānāratnavibhuṣitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārūḍhāṃ putrasahitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vahiṣyanti ca devatā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tūryasahasreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vādyamāneṣu tatpuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviṣṭamātre maitreye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṣpavarṣaṃ patiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭvaivaṃ putraṃ subrahmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvātriṃśadvaralakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyavīkṣātha mantreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā prīto bhaviṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatidvayaṃ kumārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā mantreṣu dṛśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>narādhipaś cakravartī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddho vā dvīpadottamaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca yauvanasaṃprāpto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maitreyāḥ puruṣottamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cintayiṣyati dharmātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhitā khalv iyāṃ prajāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmasvaro mahāghoṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hemavarṇo mahādyutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālavakṣāḥ pīnāṅsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmapattranibhekṣaṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hastaḥ pañcāśad ucchrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya kāyo bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>visṛtaś ca tato 'rddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śubhavarṇasamucchrayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasraiḥ saṃpuraskṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṇavānāṃ sa maitreyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantrān adhyāpayiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śaṅkho narapatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yūpam ucchrāpayiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiryañ ca ṣoḍaśavyāmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasrakam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa taṃ yūpaṃ narapatir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānāratnavibhūṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradāsyati dvijātibhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yajñaṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>saptaratnamayaṃ yūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāsyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca ratnamayaṃ yūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattamātraṃ manoramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikiriṣyanti tatkṣaṇāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yūpasya tasya maitreyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā caitām anityatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtsnaṃ vicintya saṃsāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyāṃ rocayiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatv ahaṃ pravrajitveha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛśeyam amṛtaṃ padam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimocayeyaṃ janatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyādhimṛtyujarābhayāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśītibhiḥ sahasraiḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturbhiś ca puraskṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkramiṣyati maitreyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyām agrapudgalaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgavṛkṣas tadā tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bodhivṛkṣo bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcāśadyojanāny asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śākhā ūrdhvaṃ samucchritāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣadya tasya cādhastān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maitreyo puruṣottamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuttarāṃ śivāṃ bodhiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samavāpsyati nāyakaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasyām eva ca rātrau sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravrajyāṃ niṣkramiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyām eva ca rātrau hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parāṃ bodhim avāpsyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāṅgopetayā vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deśayiṣyati saddharmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaduḥkhāpahaṃ śivam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasannāṃ janatāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyāni kathayiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamutpādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhasya samatikramam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryaṃ cāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣemaṃ nirvāṇagāminam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ cāpi dharmaṃ saṃśrutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratipatsyanti śāsane</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udyāne puṣpasaṃcchanne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sannipāto bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇaṃ ca yojanaśataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṣat tasya bhaviṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvā narapati rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkho nāma mahāyaśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā dānam asaṃkhyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyāṃ niṣkramiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasraiḥ parivāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>narādhipo viniṣkramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyām upayāsyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anenaiva pramāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānavānāṃ puraskṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maitreyasya pitā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyām niṣkramiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gṛhapatis tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sudhano nāma viśrutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravrajiṣyati śuddhātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maitreyasyānuśasane</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strīratnam atha śaṅkhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśākhā nāma viśrutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasraiḥ saṃpuraskṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>nārīṇāṃ abhiniṣkramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>pravrajyām rocayiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāṇinaḥ tatra samaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasrāṇi śatāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravrajyām upayāsyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maitreyasyānuśāsane</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>supuṣpite 'smin udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sannipāto bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samantato yojanaśataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṣat tasya bhaviṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāruṇikaḥ śāstā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maitreyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samitiṃ vyavalokyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idam arthaṃ pravakṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarve te śākyasiṃhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇiśreṣṭhena trāyinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthato lokanāthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvā saddharmadhātunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>ropitā mokṣamārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>vikṣiptā mama śāsane</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chattradhvajapatākābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhamālyavilepanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā stūpeṣu satkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgatā hi mamāntikam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṅghe dattvā ca dānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cīvaraṃ pānabhojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vividhaṃ glānabhaiṣajyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgatā hi mamāntikam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṅkumodakasekaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candanenānulepanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā śākyamuneḥ stūpeṣv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgatā hi mamāntikam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śikṣāpadāni cādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śākyasiṃhasya śāsane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paripālya yathābhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgatā hi mamāntikam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upoṣadham upoṣyeha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āryam aṣṭāṅgikaṃ śubham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturdaśīṃ pañcadaśīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakṣasyehāṣṭamīṃ tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>prātihārikapakṣaṃ cāpy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>aṣṭāṅgaṃ susamāhitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śīlāni ca samādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃprāptāni ca śāsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sattvās te śāsanaṃ gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>kṛtvā ca kuśalaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>macchāsanam upāgatāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenaite preṣitāḥ sattvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīṣṭāś ca mayāpy amī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇiśreṣṭheṇa muninā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parītā bhūrimedhasā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasannāṃ janatāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyāni kathayiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutvā ca te tato dharmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpsyanti padam uttamam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātihāryatrayeṇāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāvakān vinayiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarve te asravās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipayiṣyanti suratāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prathamaḥ sannipāto 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇāḥ ṣaṇnavatikoṭyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāvakāṇāṃ bhavacchidām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyaḥ sannipāto 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇāś caturnavatiḥ koṭyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāntānāṃ bhūrimedhasām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛtīyaḥ sannipāto 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇā dvāviṃśatiḥ koṭyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāntānāṃ śāntacetasām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='MvyG_82'>
